verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I've had many tears and sorrows

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I've had questions for tomorrow

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: There've been times

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I didn't know right from wrong

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: But in every sistuation

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: God gave blessed a consolation

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: That my trials only come to make me strong

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: I've been a lot of places and

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: I've seen many faces, but

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: There've been times, I felt so all alone

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: But in that lonely hour

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: Jesus let me know, I was His own,

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: And oh it was

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: Through it all

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: I've learned to trust in Jesus

verse.name: v16
verse.lines:
I've learned to trust in God
Through it all

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: I've learned to depend upon His word

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: So I thank God for the mountains

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: And I thank Him for the valleys

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: I thank Him for the stroms

verse.name: v21
verse.lines: He's brought me through

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: If I never had a problem

verse.name: v23
verse.lines: I woudln't know that He could solve them

verse.name: v24
verse.lines: Wouldn't know what faith in His Word could do

verse.name: v25
verse.lines: I've learned to trust in God

verse.name: v26
verse.lines: I've learned to dpepend ups His word,

verse.name: v27
verse.lines: Yes,

verse.name: v28
verse.lines: I've learned to depend upon His Word
